title: NA40011: Marine Maintenance And Repairs - Quick Facts
text:
NA40011
Course name | Marine Maintenance And Repairs
Offered by | Ocean Engineering & Naval Architecture
Credits | 3
L-T-P | 3-0-0
Previous Year Grade Distribution
{{{grades}}}
Semester | Autumn

title: Syllabus mentioned in ERP
text: Maintenance requirements - corrosion, fatigue, marine fouling; Failure causes fatigue failure of structural members, deformation failures, failure due to corrosion; Repairs to failures - Measures for failure of structural members due to deformation, corrosion, fatigue, etc; Design considerations with regard to maintenance; Maintenance scheduling; Corrosion mechanism of steel - design aspects and prevention techniques; Welding repair decision modelClassification requirements of hull survey, identification of defects in plates and welds; Underwater welding - dry and wet Welding, effect on weld composition and weld quality; Impact of preventive maintenance and repair techniques on operation.
